com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot

Class Loot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.Loot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandLoot, Experience, Gem, Item, LootCollection, Message, Money, MythicDropsItem, UnidentifiedItem

    public abstract class Loot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    A Loot has a probability of looting
    Author:
    Codisimus

    • Method Detail

      • getLoot

        public abstract void getLoot(LootBundle lootBundle,
           double lootingBonus)
        Adds the loot to the item list
        Parameters:
        lootBundle - The loot that has been rolled for
        lootingBonus - The increased chance of getting rarer loots

      • getInfoStack

        public abstract org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getInfoStack()
        Returns the information of the loot in the form of an ItemStack
        Returns:
        An ItemStack representation of the Loot

      • onToggle

        public abstract boolean onToggle(org.bukkit.event.inventory.ClickType click)
        Toggles a Loot setting depending on the type of Click
        Parameters:
        click - The type of Click (Only SHIFT_LEFT, SHIFT_RIGHT, and MIDDLE are used)
        Returns:
        true if the Loot InfoStack should be refreshed

      • modifyAmount

        public abstract boolean modifyAmount(int amount,
                   boolean both)
        Modifies the amount associated with the Loot
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to modify by (may be negative)
        both - true if both lower and upper ranges should be modified, false for only the upper range
        Returns:
        true if the Loot InfoStack should be refreshed

      • resetAmount

        public abstract boolean resetAmount()
        Resets the amount of Loot to 1
        Returns:
        true if the Loot InfoStack should be refreshed

      • onToolClick

        public boolean onToolClick(Tool tool,
                  org.bukkit.event.inventory.ClickType click)
        Manages clicking on Loot with a custom Tool
        Parameters:
        tool - The Tool that was used to click
        click - The type of Click (Only LEFT, RIGHT, MIDDLE, SHIFT_LEFT, SHIFT_RIGHT, and DOUBLE_CLICK are used)
        Returns:
        true if the Loot InfoStack should be refreshed

      • getProbability

        public double getProbability()
        Returns the chance of looting
        Returns:
        The chance of looting

      • setProbability

        public void setProbability(double probability)
        Sets the Probability of looting
        Parameters:
        probability - The Probability to be set

      • rollForLoot

        public boolean rollForLoot(double lootingBonus)
        Rolls for the loot and returns true if it was a successful roll
        Parameters:
        lootingBonus - The increased chance of getting rarer loots
        Returns:
        true if the loot should be looted

      • roll

        public static double roll()
        Returns a double between 0 (inclusive) and 100 (exclusive)
        Returns:
        The number that was rolled

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object object)
        Compares Loot objects to order them by their probability (lowest first)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        object - An object which may not be an instance of Loot
        Returns:
        0 if the object is equal to this, 1 if the object's probability is lower, and -1 otherwise
